TEXT.TITLE: ENTEX ENERGY DEVELOPMENT LTD <EED> YEAR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Unit loss 4.36 dlrs vs loss 4.27 dlrs Net loss 37.4 mln vs 32.9 mln Revs 19.3 mln vs 30.3 mln Avg units 8,413,000 vs 7,557,000 Note: Net includes writedown of oil and gas properties of 21.0 ln dlrs vs 16.5 mln dlrs and writedown of geothermal property of 10.4 mln dlrs vs 10.5 mln dlrs. Reuter
